channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for IA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for IA

item.title: Report E-2023110134
item.description:
Report E-2023110134

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-31
  • City: ELDRIDGE
  • State: IA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: GREENWOOD MOTOR LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: (1) (5) Gallon metal pail was crushed or punctured due to unprotected freight. The pallet above the freight broke and fell on to this freight. (5) Gallons released in trailer, material cleaned in house due to being paint material. Proper PPE was worn when performing clean up. No drains, waterways, or environmental impact. The material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into an overpack for proper disposal.
